import { Apollo, gql } from "apollo-angular";

const GET_DRAGONS = gql `
  query Dragons {
    dragons {
      name
      first_flight
      diameter {
        feet
      }
      launch_payload_mass {
        lb
      }
    }
  }
`;

 constructor(
  private readonly apollo: Apollo
 ) {} 


loadDragons() {  
    this.apollo.watchQuery({
      query: GET_DRAGONS
    }).valueChanges.subscribe(({data, error} : any) => {
      console.log(data)
    })
  }

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

const LOGIN = gql`
  query login($idToken: String!) {
    login(idToken: $idToken)
  }
`;

this.googleAuthService.login().then(
  (credential: GUserCredential) => {
    credential.user!.getIdToken().then((token: string) => {
      console.log(token);

      this.apollo.mutate({
        mutation: LOGIN,
        variables: {
          idToken: token
        }
      }).subscribe(({ data } : any) => {
        console.log(data);

        window.postMessage({ source: MessageOrigin.GLaDOS, type: MessageType.GoogleLoginSuccess, payload: { email: credential.user?.email, token }}, '*');
      })
    })
})

const LOGIN = gql`
  mutation login($idToken: String!) {
    login(idToken: $idToken) {
      email
      name
      picture
    }
  }
`;
